actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 98-16.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 300 - 103 (Record Vote No: 17).

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 1718) making appropriations to provide emergency expenditures to meet neglected urgent needs, to protect and add to the national wealth, resulting in not make-work but productive jobs for women and men and to help provide for the indigent and homeless for the fiscal year 1983, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 1718 (employment and social services appropriations).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 1718) making appropriations to provide emergency expenditures to meet neglected urgent needs, to protect and add to the national wealth, resulting in not make-work but productive jobs for women and men and to help provide for the indigent and homeless for the fiscal year 1983, and for other purposes.
